org.ingatan.component.librarymanager
Class QuestionListToolbar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.PaintedJPanel
                      org.ingatan.component.librarymanager.QuestionListToolbar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class QuestionListToolbar
extends PaintedJPanel

Toolbar for the QuestionList component. Incorporates:

  • move questions up/down
  • select/deselect all
  • maximise/minimise all
  • search
  • group selected questions
Notifies any added action listeners of button presses (or search event).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form
